ShahrSaD.description: The "Shahr Sade" is a simple citizen without any special powers or abilities. Their primary goal is to help the town identify and eliminate the mafia members through voting during the day. They rely on their deduction skills and the information shared by other roles.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Doctor.description: The Doctor has the ability to save one person each night from being killed. They can choose to heal themselves or another player, effectively protecting them from an assassination attempt. The Doctor's role is crucial in maintaining balance and keeping the town's key players alive.

night.name: Heal
night.description: Protect a player from night elimination.
night.effect: Prevents target from being killed by Mafia/Sniper this night.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Kar Agah.description: The "Kar Agah," or Detective, can investigate one person each night to determine if they are a member of the mafia or not. If they choose the God Father, their investigation will be incorrect. This role is vital for gathering information and guiding the town's decisions during the day.

night.name: Investigate
night.description: Learn if a player is mafia (incorrect for God Father).

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Tof Dar.description: The "Tofang Dar," or Gunman, can distribute real and fake guns to the players, which they can use during the game.

night.name: Distribute Guns
night.description: Distribute real or fake guns to players.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Tak Tir.description: The "Tak Tir Andaz," or Sniper, has the ability to kill one player during the night. They die if they choose a citizen.

night.name: Sniper Shot
night.description: Kill one player during the night. If the target is a citizen, the sniper dies.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Cowboy.description: The Cowboy can choose a player to remove from the game. However, they will also leave the game after that action.

night.name: Shoot
night.description: Choose a player to remove from the game. The Cowboy leaves the game after this action.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Ruyin tan.description: The "Ruyin Tan," or Bulletproof, is immune to being killed at night once. If targeted, they will survive the first assassination attempt but can still be eliminated by other means, such as voting during the day.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Jasoos.description: The "Jasoos," or Spy, will know who all the Mafia members are on the first night.

night.name: Reveal Mafia
night.description: Learn the identities of all Mafia members on the first night.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Keshish.description: The "Keshish," or Priest, has the power to unsilence one player during the night. If voted out during the day, they can reveal the role of a player to the public.

night.name: Unsilence
night.description: Unsilence one player during the night.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Nanva.description: The "Nanva," or Baker, is crucial for the town's survival. If they die, the town will starve to death after 5 days (or as announced by the coordinator).

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Bisim chi.description: The "Bisim Chi," or Radio Operator, can distribute a Bisim or Walkie-Talkie to two people. If both are citizens, the coordinator will wake them up so they can know each other.

night.name: Distribute Radio
night.description: Distribute a Bisim or Walkie-Talkie to two players.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Hacker.description: The Hacker will choose two people on the first night. If one of them is Mafia, the coordinator will publicly announce that the chosen list is dangerous. If two citizens or two Mafia are chosen, the announcement will not be dangerous.

night.name: Hack
night.description: Choose two players on the first night to determine if the list is dangerous.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Efsha Gar.description: The "Efsha Gar," or Revealer, can choose 1 player on two separate nights (2 overall). The chosen players' roles will be revealed if they leave the game.

night.name: Reveal Role
night.description: Choose one player on a night; if they leave the game, their role is revealed.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Afyun.description: The "Afyun," or Opium Dealer, can neutralize the Mafia's abilities for one night. However, they will leave the game after taking this action.

night.name: Neutralize Mafia
night.description: Neutralize the Mafia's abilities for one night, then leave the game.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Gor Kan.description: The "Gor Kan," or Gravedigger, can request an announcement from the coordinator. The next day, the coordinator will announce the roles of the players who have left the game.

night.name: Request Announcement
night.description: Request an announcement of roles of players who have left the game.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Ghazi.description: The "Ghazi," or Judge, can wake up once during the game and change the outcome of the election.

night.name: Change Election Outcome
night.description: Wake up and change the outcome of the election once.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Majhool.description: Two citizens who wake up to know each other and form a group. They should wake up each night and add a citizen to their group. If they choose a Mafia member, they all die.

night.name: Add to Group
night.description: Add a citizen to your group each night; if you choose a mafia member, your group dies.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

MafiaSa.description: The "Mafia Sade" is a regular mafia member without any special abilities. Their goal is to blend in with the town, avoid detection, and eliminate town members during the night.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

God F.description: The God Father is the leader of the mafia. They appear innocent if investigated by the Detective and make the final decision on who the mafia targets each night. Their survival is crucial for the mafia's success.

night.name: Kill
night.description: Choose a player for the mafia to eliminate.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Mashoghe.description: The "Mashoghe," or Lover of the God Father, makes the God Father furious if they die, allowing the Mafia to kill two people the following night.

night.name: Double Kill
night.description: If you die, the mafia can kill two players the following night.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Joker.description: The Joker chooses a player during the night. If the Detective chooses the same player, the Joker's action will reverse the results, revealing Mafia members as town and citizens as Mafia.

night.name: Joker Action
night.description: Choose a player during the night. (This action is enabled only if God F is removed.)

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

DoctorLec.description: Doctor Lecter can save one of the Mafia members from the "Tak Tir Andaz" or Sniper each night.

night.name: Save Mafia
night.description: Save one of the Mafia members from the Sniper's shot. (Available only if God F is removed.)

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Natasha.description: Natasha can silence one player each night, preventing them from talking during the next day. The Keshish or Priest can neutralize the silence effect if they choose the same person.

night.name: Silence
night.description: Silence one player for the next day. (Enabled if God F is removed.)

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Terrorist.description: If the Terrorist dies during the day by a gun or vote, they can take someone with them out of the game.

night.name: Explosive Exit
night.description: Upon death during the day, take one player out of the game.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Mozakere.description: The "Mozakere Konande," or Negotiator, can negotiate with some town citizens to become Mafia Sade. The negotiation can only be performed on Shahr Sade (simple citizens) or other roles announced by the coordinator.

night.name: Negotiate
night.description: Negotiate with citizens to potentially join the mafia.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

ShahKosh.description: The "Shah Kosh," or King Slayer, can guess the role of a citizen during the night. If guessed correctly, that player will be removed from the game.

night.name: Guess Role
night.description: Guess the role of a citizen during the night; if correct, the target is removed.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Zodiac.description: An independent serial killer immune to night attacks, killing on even nights, but vulnerable to day actions and bombs.

night.name: Serial Kill
night.description: Kill one player on even nights.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

MaskedFigure.description: Their investigation result for the detective is positive. Neither they know their allies, nor their allies know them. They cannot be eliminated by the mafia shot at night. Alpha Power: Once per game, they can freeze the detective's investigation. Beta Power: Once per game, they can guess a citizen's role. If correct, the game master confirms and transforms the target.

night.name: Freeze Investigation
night.description: Freeze the detective's investigation, causing a neutral result.

night.name: Guess Role
night.description: Guess a citizen's role; if correct, transform the target.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

DoubleFace.description: A member of the mafia team but never wakes up with them and always appears as a citizen for the detective.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Yakuza.description: A member of the mafia. When their role is revealed, they can turn one player into a mafia member, sacrificing themselves.

night.name: Convert
night.description: Turn one player into a mafia member at the cost of your life.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

MafiaSpecialist.description: If the number of players alive is half or less, they can take on a mafia role that was eliminated previously.

night.name: Revive Mafia
night.description: Assume a mafia role that was eliminated if players alive are half or less.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Butcher.description: Can convert all eliminated mafia members to regular citizens once in the game.

night.name: Convert Mafia
night.description: Convert all eliminated mafia members to citizens.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Thief.description: Can steal someone's role and use its ability.

night.name: Steal Role
night.description: Steal a role from another player and use its ability.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Trickster.description: Each night, point to two players. If one is a doctor and the other a detective, the doctor is killed and the detective is saved.

night.name: Trick
night.description: Point to two players; if one is a doctor and one a detective, apply special effects.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Enchanter.description: Each night, block a player's ability or place a word curse. If the cursed word is used the next day, the player is eliminated.

night.name: Enchant
night.description: Block a player's ability or place a word curse.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Saboteur.description: Can sabotage a player using a gun. If the sabotaged player shoots, they are killed.

night.name: Sabotage
night.description: Sabotage a player using a gun; if the sabotaged player shoots, they are killed.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

PoisonMaker.description: Can poison one player once per game. The poisoned player is eliminated two days later. Mafia cannot shoot on the night poison is used.

night.name: Poison
night.description: Poison one player; they will be eliminated two days later.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Spy.description: A mafia member whose allegiance may change if awakened by a Freemason.

night.name: Spy Action
night.description: Perform spy actions; if awakened by a Freemason, switch allegiance.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

StrongMan.description: Can use his kill one time with the godfather's confirmation. The targeted person will die regardless of their toughness.

night.name: Strong Kill
night.description: Kill one player with confirmation from the godfather; the target dies regardless of toughness.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Buyer.description: Discusses with the mafia on who to buy on the first night. Then, wakes one person; if that person is a doctor, they don't wake up, otherwise they may join the mafia.

night.name: Buy
night.description: Discuss with the mafia and select a player; if they're not a doctor, they may join the mafia.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

NamelessMafia.description: Once per game can take on any mafia or citizen role for 24 hours.

night.name: Assume Role
night.description: Take on any mafia or citizen role for 24 hours.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Dynamite.description: Can attach a bomb to a player. The next morning, the narrator announces the bomb. The target must either sacrifice themselves or defuse it correctly, or they are eliminated.

night.name: Attach Bomb
night.description: Attach a bomb to a player; the target must decide to sacrifice or defuse.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

LadyVoodoo.description: Each night chooses a player and a word. If the chosen player uses the word during the day, they are immediately removed from the game.

night.name: Curse
night.description: Choose a player and a word; if used during the day, the target is eliminated.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

AdamSnowman.description: A citizen with one bullet. If they shoot a citizen or the mafia boss, it fails and the bullet is returned the next night.

night.name: Shoot
night.description: Use your bullet to shoot a player; if you shoot a citizen or mafia boss, the shot fails.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Gambler.description: Can double the ability of one citizen or one mafia member twice.

night.name: Double Ability
night.description: Double the ability of a target; can be used twice.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Link.description: At the start of the game, links two players together. If one dies, the other dies as well.

night.name: Link
night.description: Link two players together; if one dies, the other dies.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Hunter.description: Each night, the Hunter can link with one player. If either dies during a night kill or subsequent vote, the other also dies.

night.name: Hunter Link
night.description: Link yourself with one player; if either dies, both die.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

PoliceChief.description: If they die during the day, the game master announces their role and they get one final shot. If the shot is used on a mafia, that mafia is eliminated.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

trigger.name: Last Shot
trigger.description: Upon death during the day, take one final shot at a mafia.

Revealer.description: If eliminated during the game, their role and the reason of death are revealed to everyone.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

trigger.name: Reveal
trigger.description: Upon elimination, reveal your role and reason for death.

CitizenSpecialist.description: If the number of players alive is half or less, they can take on a citizen role that was eliminated previously.

night.name: Revive Citizen
night.description: Assume a citizen role that was eliminated if players alive are half or less.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Commander.description: Wakes up after the sniper takes their shot. Can confirm or deny the sniper's shot. If the sniper mistakenly kills a citizen, the Commander may also be removed (depending on the scenario).

night.name: Counter Sniper
night.description: After a sniper shot, confirm or deny the shot.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Elite.description: Once in the game, they can ask the game master for the identity of a citizen role.

night.name: Inquiry
night.description: Ask the game master for the identity of a citizen role.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Gunsmith.description: Can give a special gun with one powerful bullet to a player. That player can use it the next day and is publicly announced. If they do not shoot, they must pass it on the next night. The gun can be sabotaged; if the shooter is shot, they die.

night.name: Arm Player
night.description: Give a special gun with one powerful bullet to a player.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Priest.description: Each night, select a number of players. The next day, those players can speak longer and are immune to silencing.

night.name: Bless
night.description: Select players to grant extended speaking time and immunity to silence for the next day.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Doppelganger.description: Starts with no allegiance; each night, choose a player. When that player is eliminated, the Doppelganger gains their ability.

night.name: Mimic
night.description: Choose a player; when they are eliminated, gain their ability.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Tyler.description: Wakes up on the first night with a Mason. They know each other and form a Freemason team.

night.name: Identify Mason
night.description: Identify your Mason partner on the first night.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Freemason.description: Wakes up each night and shows a player. If that player is a citizen, they wake up and join the team. If a mafia is mistakenly chosen, all masons are eliminated.

night.name: Recruit
night.description: Show a player and attempt to recruit them to the Freemason team.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Inquisitor.description: Can choose two players and ask the game master if they are on the same team.

night.name: Inquire Team
night.description: Choose two players to determine if they are on the same team.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Blacksmith.description: Each night, can provide a suit of armor. The recipient is protected during the day until the armor falls off.

night.name: Arm Player
night.description: Provide a suit of armor to protect a player during the day.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

CodeWriter.description: Can write a binary or 3-variable code for the game master.

night.name: Write Code
night.description: Write a binary or 3-variable code for the game master.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

RussianRoulette.description: Gives a gun to someone and picks a number; the chain shooting occurs during the day if the gun is used.

night.name: Russian Roulette
night.description: Give a gun to a player and pick a number to trigger chain shooting during the day.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Spider.description: Can weave together several players. If any woven player dies during the day, all woven players die.

night.name: Weave
night.description: Link multiple players together; if any die during the day, all die.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Bartender.description: Each night, chooses a player who becomes 'drunk' and cannot use their ability.

night.name: Intoxicate
night.description: Choose a player to make them drunk, disabling their ability for the next night.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Saba.description: Each night, can pick a player and take their role for 24 hours.

night.name: Steal Role
night.description: Take a player's role for 24 hours.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Wizard.description: Once in the game, they can choose a player. That player loses their ability and does not wake up at night for 24 hours.

night.name: Nullify
night.description: Choose a player; they lose their ability for 24 hours.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Guardian.description: If a Zodiac tries to kill the Guardian, they are eliminated instead. If the bomb is on them, they get the defusal code.

night.name: Defuse
night.description: If targeted by a Zodiac's bomb, defuse it or take the hit.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Bomber.description: If killed at night, two players on their side also die. They can use their power once to take two players out with them.

night.name: Bomb
night.description: Use your bomb to eliminate two players.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Exposer.description: If eliminated by day vote (and not by a night kill), they can choose one player and reveal whether they are a citizen or mafia member.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

trigger.name: Expose
trigger.description: Upon elimination by vote, reveal a player's faction.

Physician.description: Each night, they give an antidote to a player. If that player was poisoned, they survive. They can save themselves twice with their antidote.

night.name: Antidote
night.description: Give an antidote to a player; if poisoned, they survive.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

ToughGuy.description: If shot by the mafia, they are not eliminated immediately but lose their ability for that night; a second shot eliminates them.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Sacrifice.description: Can sacrifice themselves at any time to protect another player who is about to be voted out.

night.name: Sacrifice
night.description: Sacrifice yourself to protect another player from being voted out.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Sheriff.description: Each night, the Sheriff can shoot one player. If they shoot a mafia member, that mafia is eliminated; if they shoot a citizen, the Sheriff is eliminated.

night.name: Shoot
night.description: Shoot one player during the night; if the target is mafia, they are eliminated.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

NightWatch.description: One night in the game, they can ask the game master who targeted them. The answer reveals only the players, not their roles.

night.name: Inquiry Target
night.description: Ask the game master who targeted you during the night.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Swordsman.description: A citizen who can give a sword to another person one time in the game. The recipient may use the sword at night.

night.name: Gift Sword
night.description: Give a sword to another player; they can use it at night.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Jupiter.description: Protects a citizen from becoming a yakuza each night.

night.name: Protect
night.description: Protect a citizen from becoming a yakuza.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Ronan.description: If attacked at night and not saved by the doctor, their injury is announced the next morning. Ronan can continue to vote until the day's voting is complete.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Avenger.description: If they correctly guess the night's killer, the game master gives them a gun which they can use later.

night.name: Guess Killer
night.description: Guess the night's killer; if correct, receive a gun.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

MunitionsExpert.description: Gives a weapon to a player once in the game. The recipient can use it the next day. After announcing suspicious players, they may use the weapon to shoot one player.

night.name: Equip and Announce
night.description: Equip a player with a weapon and announce two suspicious players.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Investigator.description: Can find out the faction of a player, but must be cautious of other roles.

night.name: Investigate Faction
night.description: Determine the faction of a target player.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Executioner.description: If a player is executed by vote, their identity remains hidden. If the Executioner dies, their identity is revealed.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

trigger.name: Execute
trigger.description: When a player is executed by vote, remain hidden; if you die, your identity is revealed.

Scribe.description: Gives a paper and pen to a player. If that player is killed that night, they can make a will. If the Scribe reveals their role, the sultan gets two poisons that night.

night.name: Gift Pen
night.description: Give a paper and pen to a player for making a will if they are killed.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

WiseMan.description: Once in the game, can save one player from entering the second round of voting.

night.name: Save from Voting
night.description: Save one player from the second round of voting, once per game.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

NightWanderer.description: Can leave their tent for one night and become unreachable. Poison or weapons have no effect during that night.

night.name: Hide
night.description: Leave your tent for one night; become immune to poison and weapons.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Ocean.description: Can wake two citizens so they get to know each other, but if a mafia or Zodiac is chosen, they are eliminated the next day.

night.name: Wake
night.description: Wake two citizens to get to know each other; risk elimination if a mafia or Zodiac is chosen.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Jigsaw.description: Immortal at night, chooses 3 players and gives one a saw. In the day, the chosen player is called to the gas chamber where execution is decided.

night.name: Gas Chamber
night.description: Choose 3 players and assign a saw; later, call them to the gas chamber for execution.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

JackSparrow.description: Neither mafia nor citizen, must win alone. Immune to night kills and day voting, but must curse one person every night. Special win conditions apply.

night.name: Curse
night.description: Curse one player every night. Special conditions apply.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

SherlockHolmes.description: Helps the third godfather role. For the first two nights, is immortal and uses their sixth sense to guess a player's role. If correct, roles swap and the target is eliminated; if not, special conditions apply.

night.name: Sixth Sense
night.description: Guess a player's role using your sixth sense; if correct, swap roles and eliminate the target.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Carrier.description: Players chosen by the Carrier become infectedunable to speak on the first day, lose actions at night, cant vote on the second day, and die on the second night.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Werewolf.description: Every three nights, turns a player into a wolf. Their attack does not affect the Hunter or Priest. Their win condition is to convert half of the players into wolves.

night.name: Transform
night.description: Turn a player into a wolf; available every three nights.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Syndicate.description: Knows key roles like mafia, spy, doctor, detective, and thug. Immune to group attacks from mafia or thug. If voted in the second round, can kill one player from the blacklist.

night.name: Blacklist Kill
night.description: If voted in the second round, kill one player from your blacklist.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Killer.description: One of the strongest independent roles. Each night, they kill one person (the doctor cannot save the target). Their goal is to survive and eliminate all other players.

night.name: Assassinate
night.description: Kill one player; the doctor cannot save the target.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Corona.description: Can infect any player (mafia or citizen). Removal is only possible during the day. Any player who interacts with Corona at night dies the next day if not saved by the doctor.

night.name: Infect
night.description: Infect a player; if not saved by the doctor, they die the next day.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

Unknown.description: Starts without a team; is chosen at night and joins the chooser's team. If not chosen by the end of the game, they lose.

night.name: Choose Team
night.description: At night, join the team of the chooser.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.

ThousandFace.description: Can take on the ability of any player eliminated during the day for one day. Also, if targeted by any player at night, that target is redirected back to them.

night.name: Mimic Ability
night.description: Adopt the ability of a player eliminated during the day or reflect targeting back to the initiator.

day.name: Vote
day.description: Vote to eliminate a player during the day.
